data.introduce:
自动退票服务是在线分销平台上的一个自动化操作环节的重要服务
自动退票服务(AirTicketRefundOrder)提供的服务是：在航信在线分销平台上，根据客户请求，对已出票的订单以及PNR进行退票的功能，主要涉及到取消座位和退票。
data.business:
自动退票服务实现了自动退票的业务流程。自动退票业务可以分为两个步骤，首先需要取消座位，然后才能自动退票。退废预处理（E17接口）实现了取消座位功能。本服务包含取消座位和自动退票功能。
目前，自动退票服务可以实现以下功能：
取消座位
代理人客户可以选择用此服务来取消座位操作。
自动计算退票费
代理人客户在正式确认退票前，可先使用该功能了解下具体的退票费用信息。这时，服务会返回所退票号的退票单信息供客户查看。
提交退票单
如果代理人客户确认要提交退票单，可使用该功能完成退票单提交。这时，服务会返回退票单号。退票单提交成功，需再自行确认票面以及结算是否操作成功。
本服务对所退的机票必须满足以下条件：
该票在出票前是使用国内运价自动计算指令（PATA）或国际运价自动计算指令（QTE+DFSQ:A）来计算所订航段的运价
支持联票（备注：所有联票一次性退）；
使用该接口带订单的情况，可以不传入office号和打票机号，接口会自动获取相应的office号进行操作，如果传入office号和打票机号，则会校验传入的是否和出票的一致，不一致则提示并程序终止。
data.functions:
如果客户已经通过退废预处理（E17接口）取消了座位，那么可以直接通过传递预处理服务返回的操作单号来自动退票。
客户也可以使用本服务来执行取消座位和自动退票两个步骤。
本版本支持的自动退票场景如下：
依据票号的自动退票，返回退票单号
依据票号查询退票单信息，不退票
依据票号的自动退票，同时返回退票单号和退票单信息
订单的指定客票取消座位和自动退票，返回退票单号
订单的指定客票取消座位和查询退票费
订单的指定客票取消座位和自动退票，同时返回退票单号和退票单信息
订单预处理后的自动退票，返回退票单号
订单预处理后的查询退票费
订单预处理后的自动退票，同时返回退票单号和退票单信息
不支持同时操作多张票进行退票，只支持单张表申请退票
暂不支持非NI证件号
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketRefundRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空电子客票退票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"资源信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketRefundInfoDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退票信息","children":[{"name":"TicketRefundInfoDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票信息：每个票的退票信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类别：PNR代表ID是pnr号，ORDER代表ID是订单号","children":[]}]},{"name":"SecondFactor","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"双因素","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素代码。如CN，NI，PP，UU，ID，NM等。对应含义如下： NI（身份证）、PP（护照）、
						UU（无法识别的证件）、ID（士官证、军官证、武警警官证、海员证等）、CN（PNR）、NM（姓名）","children":[]},{"name":"@Value","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素值：1、当Code传NI、ID、UU、PP四种证件代码之一时，Value传SSR FOID或SSR DOCS录入的证件号； 2、当Code传CN时，Value则录入客票关联的订座记录编码； 3、当Code传NM时，Value传出票时使用的姓名。","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"ConjunctiveTicket","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"联票信息","children":[{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirTraveler","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息：取消座位的时候需要填写","children":[{"name":"PersonName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名的姓","children":[]}]},{"name":"Document","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"证件信息","children":[{"name":"@DocType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件类型","children":[]},{"name":"@DocID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息：取消座位的时候需要填写","children":[{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空 公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地址","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"地址代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"子舱","children":[{"name":"Night","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"SubClass","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"子舱","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigQuantity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"可用舱位数量","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发地址","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段标识","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发时间","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"PrinterInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票的打印 机信息：BOP出票订单需要填写打票机号","children":[{"name":"@Number","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打印机编号","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打印机类型。
1、BSP_DOMESTIC_ETICKET ——BSP国内
2、BSP_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——BSP国际
3、BOP_DOMESTIC_ETICKET——BOP国内
4、BOP_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——BOP国际
5、AIRLINE_DOMESTIC_ETICKET——AL国内（C系统本票）
6、AIRLINE_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——AL国际（C系统本票)
7、 CDS_DOMESTIC_ETICKET  ——CDS国内
8、 CDS_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET ——CDS国际","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ReturnRefundFormInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ConfirmRefundInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否确认退票，若为true会直接退票，若为false表示查看自动生成的退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@CancelSeatInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否取消座位","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@ConfirmRefundInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否确认退票，若为true会直接退票，若为false表示查看自动生成的退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ReturnRefundFormInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@CancelSeatInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否取消座位","children":[]},{"name":"@CheckSegStatusInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否检查客票的航段状态：当为true时，只有票面的航段状态是OPEN FOR USE的才能退票","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 订单号+pnr+票面信息+旅客信息+航段信息RQ.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<!--该票号对应的PNR未取消，所以请求取消pnr，CancelSeatInd="true"。此时需要输入请求退票对应的pnr、。旅客信息、航段信息-->
<!--确认退票才有退票单号，所以ConfirmRefundInd="true"-->
<!--如果客户还需要同时返回详细的退票单信息，则ReturnRefundFormInfoInd="true"-->
<TES_AirTicketRefundRQ ConfirmRefundInd="true" ReturnRefundFormInfoInd="true" CancelSeatInd="true">
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="bjs187" />
	</POS>
	<TicketRefundInfoDetails>
		<!--多张票多个TicketRefundInfoDetail-->
		<TicketRefundInfoDetail>
			<!-- 票所属的PNR-->
			<BookingReferenceID ID="KM0WE6" ID_Context="PNR" />
			<BookingReferenceID ID="131129171501374ee2x" ID_Context="ORDER" />
			<SecondFactor Code="CN" Value="KM0WE6" />
			<!-- 票面信息-->
			<TicketItemInfo TicketNumber="880-4193872177">
				<!--乘客信息必填-->
				<AirTraveler PassengerTypeCode="ADT">
					<PersonName>
						<Surname>HA/HA</Surname>
					</PersonName>
					<!--证件类型 和证件号必填-->
					<Document DocType="NI" DocID="12345524236Y6YG" />
				</AirTraveler>
				<!--航段信息-->
				<!-- RPH 出发时间 ,FlightNumber SegmentType必填-->
				<FlightSegment RPH="1" DepartureDateTime="2014-07-13T15:10:00" FlightNumber="7801" SegmentType="NORMAL">
					<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
					<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="CAN" />
					<MarketingAirline Code="HU" />
					<BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="Y" />
				</FlightSegment>
			</TicketItemInfo>
